display_help: Logging out in the D.U.S.T Training Facility will hone your skills further, granting you a bonus to your damage, accuracy, and range for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the D.U.S.T. Ranger Day Job badge.
display_target_help: Logging out in the D.U.S.T Training Facility will hone your skills further, granting you a bonus to your damage, accuracy, and range for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the D.U.S.T. Ranger Day Job badge.
